classes.description:
Override or extend the styles applied to the component.
See [CSS API](#css) below for more details.

color.description: The color of the component. It supports those theme colors that make sense for this component.

component.description:
The component used for the root node.
Either a string to use a DOM element or a component.

disabled.description: If `true`, the button will be disabled.

disableFocusRipple.description:
If `true`, the  keyboard focus ripple will be disabled.
`disableRipple` must also be true.

disableRipple.description:
If `true`, the ripple effect will be disabled.

⚠️ Without a ripple there is no styling for :focus-visible by default. Be sure
to highlight the element by applying separate styles with the `focusVisibleClassName`.

fullWidth.description: If `true`, the button will take up the full width of its container.

href.description:
The URL to link to when the button is clicked.
If defined, an `a` element will be used as the root node.

size.description:
The size of the button.
`small` is equivalent to the dense button styling.

descriptions.root: Styles applied to the root element.
descriptions.label: Styles applied to the span element that wraps the children.
descriptions.text: Styles applied to the root element if `variant="text"`.
descriptions.textPrimary: Styles applied to the root element if `variant="text"` and `color="primary"`.
descriptions.textSecondary: Styles applied to the root element if `variant="text"` and `color="secondary"`.
descriptions.outlined: Styles applied to the root element if `variant="outlined"`.
descriptions.outlinedPrimary: Styles applied to the root element if `variant="outlined"` and `color="primary"`.
descriptions.outlinedSecondary: Styles applied to the root element if `variant="outlined"` and `color="secondary"`.
descriptions.contained: Styles applied to the root element if `variant="contained"`.
descriptions.containedPrimary: Styles applied to the root element if `variant="contained"` and `color="primary"`.
descriptions.containedSecondary: Styles applied to the root element if `variant="contained"` and `color="secondary"`.
descriptions.disableElevation: Styles applied to the root element if `disableElevation={true}`.
descriptions.focusVisible: Pseudo-class applied to the ButtonBase root element if the button is keyboard focused.
descriptions.disabled: Pseudo-class applied to the root element if `disabled={true}`.
descriptions.colorInherit: Styles applied to the root element if `color="inherit"`.
descriptions.textSizeSmall: Styles applied to the root element if `size="small"` and `variant="text"`.
descriptions.textSizeLarge: Styles applied to the root element if `size="large"` and `variant="text"`.
descriptions.outlinedSizeSmall: Styles applied to the root element if `size="small"` and `variant="outlined"`.
descriptions.outlinedSizeLarge: Styles applied to the root element if `size="large"` and `variant="outlined"`.
descriptions.containedSizeSmall: Styles applied to the root element if `size="small"` and `variant="contained"`.
descriptions.containedSizeLarge: Styles applied to the root element if `size="large"` and `variant="contained"`.
descriptions.sizeSmall: Styles applied to the root element if `size="small"`.
descriptions.sizeLarge: Styles applied to the root element if `size="large"`.
descriptions.fullWidth: Styles applied to the root element if `fullWidth={true}`.
descriptions.startIcon: Styles applied to the startIcon element if supplied.
descriptions.endIcon: Styles applied to the endIcon element if supplied.
descriptions.iconSizeSmall: Styles applied to the icon element if supplied and `size="small"`.
descriptions.iconSizeMedium: Styles applied to the icon element if supplied and `size="medium"`.
descriptions.iconSizeLarge: Styles applied to the icon element if supplied and `size="large"`.
